get.summary: Retrieves DCAT catalog by catalog id in RDF format.
Retrieves DCAT catalog by catalog id in TTL format.
Gets the concept with the specific id.

post.summary: Creates a new CodeList, Date, Numeric or String concept.

put.summary: Sets the publication level proposal of the concept with the specified id.
Sets the publication level of the concept with the specified id.
Sets the registration status proposal of the concept with the specified id.
Sets the registration status of the concept with the specified id.

get.summary: Retrieves concept in JSON format by concept id.
Retrieves the code list entries from a concept of the type CodeList by it's id.

post.summary: Imports concept code list entries by concept id.

get.summary: Retrieves concept code list entries by concept id in CSV format.

post.summary: Imports concept code list entries by concept id in CSV format.

delete.summary: Deletes all code list entries by concept id.

Bearer.description: JWT Authorization header. Enter 'Bearer' [space] and then your token in the text input below. Example: 'Bearer 12345abcdef'
Bearer.name: Authorization
